weekly_top_story.headline: Thailand and Cambodia sign new ceasefire agreement to end border fighting
weekly_top_story.summary: Thailand and Cambodia have agreed to a ceasefire halting weeks of armed clashes over disputed border territory, potentially stabilizing regional security but with residents expressing skepticism about its longevity.

stories.headline: Trump and Zelenskyy to meet in Florida
stories.summary: President Trump is set to meet Ukrainian President Zelenskyy amid concessions aimed at ending the Russia-Ukraine war, which could accelerate peace negotiations and reshape European security dynamics.

stories.headline: Russia sends 3 Iranian satellites into orbit, report says
stories.summary: Russia launched three Iranian communications satellites, deepening military-technical cooperation between the two nations and potentially enhancing Iran's surveillance capabilities amid global tensions.
